features: Package Include: you will receive 4 pieces of black metal dustpan for daily cleaning and maintain; Large enough to hold dust and garbage debris, enough quantity can meet your various needs, and you can use the dustpan indoors to clean corner of your home, and you can also use it outdoors

Reliable Material: the handheld wide scooper is made of iron metal with black coating on the surface, which is sturdy and can withstand the pressure of heavy objects; Under the premise of large capacity, there will be no damage due to too many things loaded, easy to clean and use; It is an alternative to plastic dustpans and is long lasting

Ergonomic Handle: the dust and debris cleaning tool's looped handle is ergonomic and comfortable to hold and use; The loop handle is also convenient to hang for easy storage after use, ideal for garage and workshop cleanup

Improve Cleaning Efficiency: the handheld metal dustpan is designed with a 12 inch wide front mouth, which has a large space to collect a lot of garbage, ensuring cleaning efficiency, ideal for small and large sweeping jobs, saving you the trouble of dumping back and forth

Precision Edge: the edge of the dustpan is designed to be thin for easy sweeping of dust and debris without leaving annoying dirt lines after sweeping, allowing you to clean up messy places without spending much time sweeping the same area multiple times, thereby keeping the floor clean
body.description: Features: Easy to clean: The metal material makes the dustpan easy to clean. Users only need to wipe with a damp cloth or rinse with water without using other cleaning detergent. Wide application: The industrial dustpan is a sturdy and reliable cleaning tool for household, commercial and industrial use. It is suitable for your garden, garage, patio, wood cooker, woodworking room, and more. Specifications: Material: metal ironColor: blackSize: approx. 12 inches in front mouth widthPackage includes: 4 x Black Industrial Metal DustpanNotes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewText: This metal dustpan is great. Very sturdy and strong. Great price for what you get

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Every one of them has some kind of defect
reviews.reviewText: How many industrial metal dust pans does one need? Well, apparently four, because that's how many come in this item. Unfortunately, every single one of the dustpans I received has some kind of flaw. Not one of them had a cleanly painted reverse side. The paint covered everywhere, but had either a few pebbly bubbles or in a couple cases, almost half the back was covered with prickly paint. One arrived with dents in it. Two others had marred front surfaces in one way or another. See photos for all the details. Are they metal? Yes. Are they dustpans? Yes. They're even heavy duty, with a wide easy-grip tubular handle. However, not one of them is in what I would consider saleable condition. The formation and construction of this product seems sound, but the finishing detail needs a lot of work.
